title: What Type Is?
author: pippovercelli

comments.content: This forum is for requesting critiques of typefaces you've made. For Type ID Requests, please use: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416013803/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

The slab serif is [Glypha](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416013803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/glypha/). The sans is [ITC Franklin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416013803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/franklin-gothic/).
